thread.title: Win a walking holiday for two in the Lake District
thread.title_full: Win a walking holiday for two in the Lake District - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a walking holiday for two in the Lake District
text: To celebrate 60 years since the Lake District’s Hassness Country House passed into Ramblers Worldwide Holidays' stewardship, we’re offering the chance to win a walking holiday for two to this stunning Buttermere retreat. The prize is a seven-night walking holiday for two in the Lake District, staying at Hassness Country House on the shores of Lake Buttermere. This is a small-group guided walking holiday for two people sharing a twin room. The prizewinner and guest will need to choose a holiday to suit their ability and comfort level and come equipped with the correct clothing and footwear. The prize is non transferrable and there is no cash equivalent. The prize doesn’t include transfers and is subject to availability. Hassness Country House is located in the heart of fantastic walking country and offers a wide variety of walking holidays during the season to suit all fitness and walking levels from leisurely to challenging. Holiday highlights: • A guided walk each day • Discover the less visited Western Lakes and some of Britain’s best views Full-board: • Breakfast each day • Lunches on walking days • Home cooked, locally sourced dinners except Tuesday For the chance to win a seven-night walking holiday in the Lake District, complete the form below by midnight on 30 November, 2015. The winner will be notified by 31 December, 2015. • To find out more call 01707 386800 or visit www.ramblerscountrywide.co.uk Online Form - Win a walking holiday for two in the Lake District
